snippet: Your dog and your grandfather may have more in common than you think.
abstract: Julie Lasky article recounts names of dogs in her Upper Manhattan neighborhood, including her own Clara, 2-year-old Wheaten terrier; notes survey by VPI pet insurance finds two most popular dog names today are Max and Bella.
lead_paragraph: Your dog and your grandfather may have more in common than you think.

headline.seo: A Dog With Your Grandfather’s Name
